name: There is Only One Way
description:
There's only one way to the boss. Shoot your way to the end!

This was a game made for the 2018 GMTK game jam by 4 people, with the theme of "one way". Unfortunately, I lost the link and couldn't find it again, so I'm reuploading it.

Credits and shout outs to my fellow developers: Austin, James, and Gil.
